description.text: No horse shows here, instead a battleground for Heroes. Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: No horse shows here, instead a battleground for Heroes. Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: Это не знаменитая выставка лошадей, это место, куда отправляются герои. Два куба и база.

es.original: No horse shows here, instead a battleground for Heroes. Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
Un campo de batalla digno de los dioses.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: No horse shows here, instead a battleground for Heroes. Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Ein Schlachtfeld für wahre Helden. Hier wird kein Fußball gespielt! Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

fr.original: No horse shows here, instead a battleground for Heroes. Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: Un vrai champ de bataille pour héros. Deux cubes et une base.

pt.original: No horse shows here, instead a battleground for Heroes. Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: Um lugar nada idílico, um campo de batalha para heróis. Dois Cubos e uma Base.
